Plot: A Queens couple who specialize in robbing mafia social clubs stumble upon a score bigger than they could ever imagine, becoming targets of both the mob and the FBI in the process.
Title: Rob the Mob
Actors: Michael Pitt, Nina Arianda, Andy Garcia, Ray Romano
tomatoConsensus: Bolstered by a pair of likable leads and suffused in a warmly nostalgic glow, Rob the Mob is an uneven crime caper that mostly works.
